name: Basic Metalcraft
desc: Simple techniques that all with a metal companion can easily accomplish.

abilities.name: Metallic Essence
abilities.effect: _Prepare_ 2 _Momentum_ on a _Wielded_ piece of _Metal_ _Equipment_, then _Prepare_ 2 _Essence_ on a _Metal_ _Art_.

abilities.name: Metalbending
abilities.effect:
Choose one:
* Resolve the Interaction effect of a piece of _Metal_ _Terrain_ within Range, paying the cost in Essence.
* _Bend_ [_Metal_] 1.
* Gain _Kinesis_ [_Metal_] within Range this _Turn_.

abilities.name: Metal Ward
abilities.effect: You may roll your _Defend_ twice and take the better result.

name: Metal Grasp
desc: Basic metalcraft techniques focused on pushing and pulling metal.
special: While any _Essence_ is _Prepared_ on this _Art_ gain [_Discount_ 1] on all [_Armament_] abilities when targeting exclusively [_Metal_] equipment.

abilities.name: Improved Metalbending
abilities.effect:
Choose one:
* Use _Metalbending_ from _Basic Metalcraft_ at no Cost and at _Medium_- Range.
* _Bend_ [_Metal_] 2.

abilities.name: Metal Shot
abilities.effect: Choose a 0 _Load_ _Metal_ _Item_ that you have _Equipped_/_Wielded_ or is _Unattended_ within _Close_- _Range_. Attack a Target within _Range_, placing the _Equipment_ _Unattended_ at the Target's _Position_. If you choose _Equipment_ not at your _Position_, add [_Remote_]. If you choose _Equipment_ at your _Position_, you may instead convert one _Stun_ to _Damage_.
abilities.special: If the Item used for this has an Attack with _Slash_ or _Stab_ you may replace _Crush_ with said keyword.

boosts.name: Heavy Shot
boosts.effect:
You may instead use a _Load_ X piece of _Equipment_. If you spend 2 _Essence_, this is instead a _Balanced_ Attack. If you spend 3, it is instead _Heavy_. Modify the attack as follows:
* _Graze_: Deal +X Damage and +X _Stun_.
* _Hit_+: Deal +2X Damage.

name: Sturdy
desc: You are exceptionally tough, pushing through any difficulty with determination and grit.

abilities.name: Second Wind
abilities.effect: _Recover_, then clear 3 _Stun_. You may only use this Manuever once per _Round_.

abilities.name: Power Through
abilities.effect: You may instead _Negate_ with _Grit_ or, if already _Negating_ with _Grit_, _Negate_ with _Advantage_. If you succeed, gain 2 _Vigor_.

abilities.name: Endure
abilities.effect: Instead, set your _Health_ to 1 and/or do not gain _Break_.

name: Overwhelming Strength
desc: You unleash your strength, decimating the terrain and flinging creatures away.

abilities.name: Shove
abilities.effect: Inflict _Push_ [5 _Grit_] on a Target within Range. This Attack is always treated as a _Hit_.
abilities.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add an additional Target. You may repeat this _Boost_.

abilities.name: Collateral Damage
abilities.effect: Repeat the Attack against an _Obstacle_ at the same _Position_ as the Target, dealing +3 Damage.
abilities.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Use this _Gambit_ even if you did not qualify for one.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.effect: Deal +1 _Bonus Damage_ and inflict _Push_ [6 _Grit_]/_Prone_ [4 _Grit_/_Reflex_]/_Sundered_ [4 _Reflex_] on one Target.
abilities.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Use this _Gambit_ even if you did not qualify for one.
